definition: the Ming tombs (mausoleum park of the Ming emperors in Changping district of Beijing)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
ten/10
surname San
three/3
mound/tomb/hill/mountain

sentences.english: Remember that trip to the Ming Tombs on our bicycles?
sentences.chinese: 记得我们骑自行车去明十三陵的那次旅行吗？

sentences.english: Thirty miles northwest of Beijing is the vast burial site of 13 of China’s 16 Ming emperors.
sentences.chinese: 北京西北方向30英里的地方是明十三陵。

sentences.english: We visited the Summer Place, the Forbidden City, Ming Tombs and many parks there.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了颐和园，故宫，明十三陵还有好多公园。

sentences.english: To go to both the Ming Tombs and the Summer Palace?
sentences.chinese: 明十三陵和颐和园皆能去吗？

sentences.english: We are going to the Ming Tombs at theweekend. Would you like to come with us?
sentences.chinese: 我们周末去明十三陵，你想和我们一起去吗？

sentences.english: The Ming Dynasty Tombs are located some 50 kilometers due North of Beijing at an especially selected site.
sentences.chinese: 明十三陵位于北京以北，距北京约五十公里。

sentences.english: We 're going to visit the Ming Tombs.
sentences.chinese: 我们准备去参观明十三陵。

sentences.english: We're going to visit the Ming Tombs.
sentences.chinese: 我们准备去参观明十三陵。

sentences.english: Dingling is the only one of the 13 Ming tombs excavated so far.
sentences.chinese: 定陵是明十三陵中至今惟一挖掘出的陵墓。

sentences.english: I will take you to the famous Ming Tombs.
sentences.chinese: 我会带您去参观明十三陵。

sentences.english: B I want to book a trip to the Great Wall and the Ming Tombs .
sentences.chinese: 我想预订去长城和明十三陵的游览行程。

sentences.english: To go to both the Ming Tombsthe Summer Palace?
sentences.chinese: 明十三陵和颐和园都能去吗？

sentences.english: "Atoll acetabular valley Natural Beauty" at the Ming Tombs about 4 km northwest.
sentences.chinese: “碓臼峪自然风景区”在明十三陵西北约4公里处。

sentences.english: And maybe the Ming Tombs too.
I want to book a trip to the Great Wall and the Ming Tombs.
sentences.chinese: 我想预订去长城和明十三陵的行程。

sentences.english: Ming tombs museum is one of the renowned ancient imperial tombs museums in china.
sentences.chinese: 明十三陵博物馆是中国著名的古帝陵博物馆之一。

definition: Ming tombs in Nanjing, tomb of founding Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang 朱元璋[Zhu1 Yuan2 zhang1], a World Heritage site
Summer Palace in Beijing
tomb (of king or emperor)
Yuanmingyuan, the Old Summer Palace, destroyed by the British and French army in 1860
the tomb of the first emperor at Mt Li 驪山|骊山[Li2 shan1] near Xi'an (awaits excavation)
former imperial palace
the Forbidden City/abbr. for 故宮博物院|故宫博物院[Gu4 gong1 Bo2 wu4 yuan4]
Jingshan (name of a hill in Jingshan park)
tomb/mausoleum
Jingshan Park (park in Beijing)
Qianling at Xianyang 咸陽市|咸阳市 in Shaanxi, burial site of third Tang emperor 高宗 and empress Wuzetian 武則天|武则天
cemetery/mausoleum park
Temple of Heaven (in Beijing)
Tanzhe Temple
the Forbidden City/the Imperial Palace in Beijing/same as 故宮|故宫[Gu4 gong1]
the mausoleum of the First Emperor near Xi'an
Mukden Palace, aka Shenyang Imperial Palace, the main imperial palace during the early years of the Qing dynasty (1625-1644), a secondary palace in subsequent years, now a museum
